Name: Lucky Box
Desc:
▶ An event where all the players on the server take on the challenge at once.
▶ New rewards are available for each event rotation.
▶ Tickets needed to participate in the Event can be obtained from Summon Boxes, which can be found in the Shop.
ConditionDesc: You can access the draw event after reaching Lv. 10.
BroadCastingMessage: Congratulations! [Player] has won the #[Rank] prize in the Lucky Box Event.
